              ,
               
              that
               
              this
               
              sight
               
              should
               
              make
               
              so
               
              deep
               
              a
               
              wound

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
And
               
              yet
               
              detested
               
              life
               
              not
               
              shrink
               
              thereat
              !

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
That
               
              ever
               
              death
               
              should
               
              let
               
              life
               
              bear
               
              his
               
              name
              ,

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Where
               
              life
               
              hath
               
              no
               
              more
               
              interest
               
              but
               
              to
               
              breathe
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Alas
              ,
               
              poor
               
              heart
              ,
               
              that
               
              kiss
               
              is
               
              comfortless

speaker: MARCUS
text:
As
               
              frozen
               
              water
               
              to
               
              a
               
              starvèd
               
              snake
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
When
               
              will
               
              this
               
              fearful
               
              slumber
               
              have
               
              an
               
              end
              ?

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Now
               
              farewell
              ,
               
              flatt’ry
              ;
               
              die
              ,
               
              Andronicus
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Thou
               
              dost
               
              not
               
              slumber
              .
               
              See
               
              thy
               
              two
               
              sons’
               
              heads
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Thy
               
              warlike
               
              hand
              ,
               
              thy
               
              mangled
               
              daughter
               
              here
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Thy
               
              other
               
              banished
               
              son
               
              with
               
              this
               
              dear
               
              sight

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Struck
               
              pale
               
              and
               
              bloodless
              ;
               
              and
               
              thy
               
              brother
              ,
               
              I
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Even
               
              like
               
              a
               
              stony
               
              image
               
              cold
               
              and
               
              numb
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              now
               
              no
               
              more
               
              will
               
              I
               
              control
               
              thy
               
              griefs
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Rent
               
              off
               
              thy
               
              silver
               
              hair
              ,
               
              thy
               
              other
               
              hand
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Gnawing
               
              with
               
              thy
               
              teeth
              ,
               
              and
               
              be
               
              this
               
              dismal
               
              sight

speaker: MARCUS
text:
The
               
              closing
               
              up
               
              of
               
              our
               
              most
               
              wretched
               
              eyes
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Now
               
              is
               
              a
               
              time
               
              to
               
              storm
              .
               
              Why
               
              art
               
              thou
               
              still
              ?

speaker: TITUS
text:
Ha
              ,
               
              ha
              ,
               
              ha
              !

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Why
               
              dost
               
              thou
               
              laugh
              ?
               
              It
               
              fits
               
              not
               
              with
               
              this
               
              hour
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Why
              ,
               
              I
               
              have
               
              not
               
              another
               
              tear
               
              to
               
              shed
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Besides
              ,
               
              this
               
              sorrow
               
              is
               
              an
               
              enemy

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              would
               
              usurp
               
              upon
               
              my
               
              wat’ry
               
              eyes

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              make
               
              them
               
              blind
               
              with
               
              tributary
               
              tears
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Then
               
              which
               
              way
               
              shall
               
              I
               
              find
               
              Revenge’s
               
              cave
              ?

speaker: TITUS
text:
For
               
              these
               
              two
               
              heads
               
              do
               
              seem
               
              to
               
              speak
               
              to
               
              me

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              threat
               
              me
               
              I
               
              shall
               
              never
               
              come
               
              to
               
              bliss

speaker: TITUS
text:
Till
               
              all
               
              these
               
              mischiefs
               
              be
               
              returned
               
              again

speaker: TITUS
text:
Even
               
              in
               
              their
               
              throats
               
              that
               
              hath
               
              committed
               
              them
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Come
              ,
               
              let
               
              me
               
              see
               
              what
               
              task
               
              I
               
              have
               
              to
               
              do
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
You
               
              heavy
               
              people
              ,
               
              circle
               
              me
               
              about

speaker: TITUS
text:
That
               
              I
               
              may
               
              turn
               
              me
               
              to
               
              each
               
              one
               
              of
               
              you

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              swear
               
              unto
               
              my
               
              soul
               
              to
               
              right
               
              your
               
              wrongs
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
The
               
              vow
               
              is
               
              made
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              brother
              ,
               
              take
               
              a
               
              head
              ,

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              in
               
              this
               
              hand
               
              the
               
              other
               
              will
               
              I
               
              bear
              .
              —

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
              ,
               
              Lavinia
              ,
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              be
               
              employed
               
              in
               
              these
               
              arms
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Bear
               
              thou
               
              my
               
              hand
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              wench
              ,
               
              between
               
              thy
               
              teeth
              .
              —

speaker: TITUS
text:
As
               
              for
               
              thee
              ,
               
              boy
              ,
               
              go
               
              get
               
              thee
               
              from
               
              my
               
              sight
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Thou
               
              art
               
              an
               
              exile
              ,
               
              and
               
              thou
               
              must
               
              not
               
              stay
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Hie
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Goths
               
              and
               
              raise
               
              an
               
              army
               
              there
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
And
               
              if
               
              you
               
              love
               
              me
              ,
               
              as
               
              I
               
              think
               
              you
               
              do
              ,

speaker: TITUS
text:
Let’s
               
              kiss
               
              and
               
              part
              ,
               
              for
               
              we
               
              have
               
              much
               
              to
               
              do
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              Andronicus
              ,
               
              my
               
              noble
               
              father
              ,

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
The
               
              woefull’st
               
              man
               
              that
               
              ever
               
              lived
               
              in
               
              Rome
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              proud
               
              Rome
              ,
               
              till
               
              Lucius
               
              come
               
              again
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
He
               
              loves
               
              his
               
              pledges
               
              dearer
               
              than
               
              his
               
              life
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              Lavinia
              ,
               
              my
               
              noble
               
              sister
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
O
              ,
               
              would
               
              thou
               
              wert
               
              as
               
              thou
               
              tofore
               
              hast
               
              been
              !

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
But
               
              now
               
              nor
               
              Lucius
               
              nor
               
              Lavinia
               
              lives

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
But
               
              in
               
              oblivion
               
              and
               
              hateful
               
              griefs
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
If
               
              Lucius
               
              live
               
              he
               
              will
               
              requite
               
              your
               
              wrongs

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
And
               
              make
               
              proud
               
              Saturnine
               
              and
               
              his
               
              empress

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Beg
               
              at
               
              the
               
              gates
               
              like
               
              Tarquin
               
              and
               
              his
               
              queen
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Now
               
              will
               
              I
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Goths
               
              and
               
              raise
               
              a
               
              power

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
To
               
              be
               
              revenged
               
              on
               
              Rome
               
              and
               
              Saturnine
              .
